verses.verse: שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> Hear נָ֕א <WH4994> now אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> ye now what the LORD אֹמֵ֑ר <WH559> saith ק֚וּם <WH6965> Arise רִ֣יב <WH7378> contend אֶת־ <WH854> before הֶהָרִ֔ים <WH2022> thou before the mountains וְתִשְׁמַ֥עְנָה <WH8085> hear הַגְּבָע֖וֹת <WH1389> and let the hills קוֹלֶֽךָ׃ <WH6963> thy voice

שִׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> Hear הָרִים֙ <WH2022> ye O mountains אֶת־ <WH853> רִ֣יב <WH7379> controversy יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God וְהָאֵתָנִ֖ים <WH386> and ye strong מֹ֣סְדֵי <WH4146> foundations אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because רִ֤יב <WH7379> hath a controversy לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3069> God עִם־ <WH5973> against עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> with his people וְעִם־ <WH5973> against יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> with Israel יִתְוַכָּֽח׃ <WH3198> and he will plead

עַמִּ֛י <WH5971> O my people מֶה־ <WH4100> what עָשִׂ֥יתִי <WH6213> what have I done לְךָ֖ וּמָ֣ה <WH4100> and how הֶלְאֵתִ֑יךָ <WH3811> unto thee? and wherein have I wearied עֲנֵ֥ה <WH6030> thee? testify בִֽי׃

כִּ֤י <WH3588> Indeed הֶעֱלִתִ֙יךָ֙ <WH5927> For I brought thee up מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וּמִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> thee out of the house עֲבָדִ֖ים <WH5650> of servants פְּדִיתִ֑יךָ <WH6299> and redeemed וָאֶשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> and I sent לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> thee Moses אַהֲרֹ֥ן <WH175> Aaron וּמִרְיָֽם׃ <WH4813> and Miriam

עַמִּ֗י <WH5971> O my people זְכָר־ <WH2142> remember נָא֙ <WH4994> now מַה־ <WH4100> What יָּעַ֗ץ <WH3289> consulted בָּלָק֙ <WH1111> now what Balak מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab וּמֶה־ <WH4100> and what עָנָ֥ה <WH6030> answered אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> בִּלְעָ֣ם <WH1109> and what Balaam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בְּע֑וֹר <WH1160> of Beor מִן־ <WH4480> at הַשִּׁטִּים֙ <WH7851> him from Shittim עַד־ <WH5704> against הַגִּלְגָּ֔ל <WH1537> unto Gilgal לְמַ֕עַן <WH4616> So דַּ֖עַת <WH3045> that ye may know צִדְק֥וֹת <WH6666> the righteousness יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

בַּמָּה֙ <WH4100> what אֲקַדֵּ֣ם <WH6923> Wherewith shall I come before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD אִכַּ֖ף <WH3721> [and] bow לֵאלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God מָר֑וֹם <WH4791> myself before the high הַאֲקַדְּמֶ֣נּוּ <WH6923> come בְעוֹל֔וֹת <WH5930> him with burnt offerings בַּעֲגָלִ֖ים <WH5695> with calves בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> With שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> of a year

הֲיִרְצֶ֤ה <WH7521> be pleased יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Will the LORD בְּאַלְפֵ֣י <WH505> with thousands אֵילִ֔ים <WH352> of rams בְּרִֽבְב֖וֹת <WH7233> [or] with ten thousands נַֽחֲלֵי־ <WH5158> of rivers שָׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> anointing הַאֶתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> add בְּכוֹרִי֙ <WH1060> my firstborn פִּשְׁעִ֔י <WH6588> [for] my transgression פְּרִ֥י <WH6529> the fruit בִטְנִ֖י <WH990> of my body חַטַּ֥את <WH2403> [for] the sin נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> He

הִגִּ֥יד <WH5046> He hath shewed לְךָ֛ אָדָ֖ם <WH120> thee O man מַה־ <WH4100> what טּ֑וֹב <WH2896> what [is] good וּמָֽה־ <WH4100> and what יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> and what doth the LORD דּוֹרֵ֣שׁ <WH1875> require מִמְּךָ֗ <WH4480> at כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> But עֲשׂ֤וֹת <WH6213> of thee but to do מִשְׁפָּט֙ <WH4941> justly וְאַ֣הֲבַת <WH160> and to love חֶ֔סֶד <WH2617> mercy וְהַצְנֵ֥עַ <WH6800> humbly לֶ֖כֶת <WH1980> walk עִם־ <WH5973> with אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> angels פ

ק֤וֹל <WH6963> voice יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> The LORD'S לָעִ֣יר <WH5892> unto the city יִקְרָ֔א <WH7121> crieth וְתוּשִׁיָּ֖ה <WH8454> and [the man of] wisdom יִרְאֶ֣ה <WH3372> to fear שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <WH8034> thy name שִׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> hear מַטֶּ֖ה <WH4294> ye the rod וּמִ֥י <WH4310> Who יְעָדָֽהּ׃ <WH3259> and who hath appointed

ע֗וֹד <WH5750> yet הַאִשׁ֙ <WH784> burning בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> in the house רָשָׁ֔ע <WH7563> of the wicked אֹצְר֖וֹת <WH214> yet the treasures רֶ֑שַׁע <WH7562> of wickedness וְאֵיפַ֥ת <WH374> measure רָז֖וֹן <WH7332> and the scant זְעוּמָֽה׃ <WH2194> [that is] abominable

הַאֶזְכֶּ֖ה <WH2135> Shall I count [them] pure בְּמֹ֣אזְנֵי <WH3976> balances רֶ֑שַׁע <WH7562> with the wicked וּבְכִ֖יס <WH3599> and with the bag אַבְנֵ֥י <WH68> stones מִרְמָֽה׃ <WH4820> of deceitful

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> him עֲשִׁירֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH6223> For the rich men מָלְא֣וּ <WH4390> thereof are full חָמָ֔ס <WH2555> of violence וְיֹשְׁבֶ֖יהָ <WH3427> and the inhabitants דִּבְּרוּ־ <WH1696> thereof have spoken שָׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> lies וּלְשׁוֹנָ֖ם <WH3956> and their tongue רְמִיָּ֥ה <WH7423> [is] deceitful בְּפִיהֶֽם׃ <WH6310> in their mouth

וְגַם־ <WH1571> also אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I הֶחֱלֵ֣יתִי <WH2470> Therefore also will I make [thee] sick הַכּוֹתֶ֑ךָ <WH5221> in smiting הַשְׁמֵ֖ם <WH8074> thee in making [thee] desolate עַל־ <WH5921> because חַטֹּאתֶֽךָ׃ <WH2403> because of thy sins

אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> You תֹאכַל֙ <WH398> Thou shalt eat וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִשְׂבָּ֔ע <WH7646> but not be satisfied וְיֶשְׁחֲךָ֖ <WH3445> and thy casting down בְּקִרְבֶּ֑ךָ <WH7130> [shall be] in the midst וְתַסֵּג֙ <WH5253> of thee and thou shalt take hold וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> you will not תַפְלִ֔יט <WH6403> but shalt not deliver וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> and what תְּפַלֵּ֖ט <WH6403> and [that] which thou deliverest לַחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> to the sword אֶתֵּֽן׃ <WH5414> will I give up

אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> You תִזְרַ֖ע <WH2232> Thou shalt sow וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> you will not תִקְצ֑וֹר <WH7114> but thou shalt not reap אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> You תִדְרֹֽךְ־ <WH1869> thou shalt tread זַ֙יִת֙ <WH2132> the olives וְלֹא־ <WH3808> but will not תָס֣וּךְ <WH5480> but thou shalt not anoint שֶׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> thee with oil וְתִיר֖וֹשׁ <WH8492> and sweet wine וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> you will not תִשְׁתֶּה־ <WH8354> but shalt not drink יָּֽיִן׃ <WH3196> wine

וְיִשְׁתַּמֵּ֞ר <WH8104> are kept חֻקּ֣וֹת <WH2708> For the statutes עָמְרִ֗י <WH6018> of Omri וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> and all מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> and all the works בֵית־ <WH1004> of the house אַחְאָ֔ב <WH256> of Ahab וַתֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> walk בְּמֹֽעֲצוֹתָ֑ם <WH4156> in their counsels לְמַעַן֩ <WH4616> Therefore תִּתִּ֨י <WH5414> that I should make אֹתְךָ֜ <WH853> לְשַׁמָּ֗ה <WH8047> thee a desolation וְיֹשְׁבֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH3427> and the inhabitants לִשְׁרֵקָ֔ה <WH8322> thereof an hissing וְחֶרְפַּ֥ת <WH2781> the reproach עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> of my people תִּשָּֽׂאוּ׃ <WH5375> therefore ye shall bear פ
